EmailTemplate.name: Web-based EMS Software_0313.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for registering for this complimentary live webinar.
TriTech Senior Product Manager, Charlie Barry and AmbCoach, Inc. President, Kimberly Walk look forward to sharing both the business and user perspectives of the web-based trend in EMS Software.
You will receive a reminder email one week and one day prior to the live webinar.
WEBINAR DETAILS
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/cjfsxxm
DATE: Tuesday, March 13, 2012 TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS: Charlie Barry, Sr Product Manager and Kimberly Walk, AmbCoach, Inc. President
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
See online on March 13!
